name: Space Roads
description:
A simple endless runner type game created for Armory3D community Jam. This game was inspired by an old game called "Sky Roads".  The objective is to gain as much score as possible by dodging the levels. You might  be attacked by round enemy tracking mines, take them out with your laser weapon. 

Hope you have fun!

Controls:

  • A, D to steer the space ship
  • Space Bar to Jump
  • Left Mouse to shoot lasers
  • R to restart
  • ESC to close the application

Credits:

I thank the following people/ community for their contribution

  • The Armory3D community for awesome engine and the space ship asset
  • Kenney Vleugels (www.kenney.nl) for CC0 sound assets
  • BLACK LODGE GAMES for CC0 sound effects
  • Juhani Junkala for awesome CC0 game music
